# Quick start

## 1 Install openlayers

You can install openlayers from github with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers")
```

## 2 Attach the namespace

```{r, echo = TRUE, message = TRUE}
library(openlayers)
```

## 3 Create a new map object

```{r, eval = FALSE}
map <- ol()
```

## 4 Add tiles

```{r, eval = FALSE}
map <- ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles()
```

## 5 Add some features

```{r, eval = TRUE, message = FALSE}
map <- ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles() %>%
  add_vector_data(geojsonio::us_cities[1:5, ],
                  style = icon_style())
```

## 6 Render the map

```{r, eval = TRUE}
map
```
